price: 79. Que non ! Nous écrirons ce qu’il dit et Nous accentuerons pour lui le supplice.
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ مَدّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kallā sanaktubu mā yaqūlu wanamuddu lahu mina al-ʿadhābi maddan
